fields.name: Display_Oops_No_transactions
fields.fieldText: Oops! No Transactions found. Please check the GL Account.

fields.name: Display_Text_Finance_Warning
fields.fieldText: Note: You must have a Financial Force license to generate the expense report.

fields.name: Display_Text_Request_Expenses
fields.fieldText:
Send an email to Accounts Payable to request expenses for the following event?:


{!var_Event_Record.Name} - ({!var_Event_Record.GL_Code_Finance__c})

fields.name: Screen_Email_Recipients_Comma_Delimited
fields.helpText: Enter up to (5) email addresses separated by commas.

validationRule.errorMessage: Oops! Please enter a max of 5 email addresses.

textTemplates.name: Text_Temp_Email_Body
textTemplates.text:
Hello,

Here are the accumulated costs for {!var_Event_Record.Name} - ({!var_Event_Record.GL_Code_Finance__c}):

Total Accumulated Costs: {!var_Total_Home_Value}

{!Text_Temp_TransactionLIsTable}
